MEASUREMENT_INTERVAL_DOC: Time between light sensor readings. Lower values provide more responsive brightness changes but may increase CPU usage.
MIN_BACKLIGHT_DOC: The lowest brightness level the display will reach (0-255). Prevents the screen from becoming too dark.
MAX_BACKLIGHT_DOC: The highest brightness level the display will reach (0-255). Can be reduced to save power.
LUX_MULTIPLIER_DOC: Calibration multiplier for the VEML7700 sensor. Increase for brighter response, decrease for darker response.
SMOOTHING_FACTOR_DOC: Controls how quickly brightness transitions occur (0.0-1.0). Lower values create slower, smoother transitions.
PLAYBACK_BOOST_DOC: Additional brightness added during music playback (0-255). Set to 0 to disable this feature.
PLAYBACK_BOOST_DURATION_DOC: How long to maintain the brightness boost after playback stops (0-300 seconds). Recommended: 30 seconds.
